Articles.Content:
Hi guys, I'm about to strip my KSP install down to stock and slowly reintroduce all of the mods I've got in an effort to figure this out, but before I go through that I figured I'd ask - has anyone else encountered just the small Mk1 airplane cockpit having a missing IVA? The pilot's portrait isn't there, and 'C' doesn't get me to the IVA. I can still click the door and get the little Kerman out, and the module is controllable.

I haven't had this issue with any other cockpit, stock or otherwise. Specifically, I mean the pointy Mk1 cockpit, not the inline model.

Thanks for your time either way!
Strange. Any screenies? There was a bug involving IVAs and crew transfer, but it was fixed in a silent patch.
Are you using steam? Have you tried verifying your cache? You may have a missing texture. A log would help identify this too.

Yep to Steam,

There's one of them in flight without the pilot portrait, I'll see about a log
Verifying the cache didn't seem to fix it. As an aside it seems to have kicked out the 64-bit hack.
Wait? You are using the 64 bit community workaround? Can you reproduce in 32 bit?

Yeah the IVA issue was still present in 32-bit. All other cockpits work fine. I'm going to try to find the time to strip the mods out today and see if any of them are responsible, but to be honest I haven't got the biggest mod collection going - certainly nothing unique.

im having the same issue, also using steam.

i already deleted the entire squad folder, had it redownload and then tried without any mods...

...but nope, no IVA.

@Kowalskicore, can you open the KSP folder and check that GameData/Squad/Spaces/mk1CockpitInternal/ is there?

It should contain six files.

http://i.imgur.com/LoM4xFo.jpg

Here's my six. How odd. Haven't done a complete return to stock yet but took out some mods that I thought might've been responsible, still no IVA

Those are the right files, I assume you have module manager, as many mods rely on it, if you have it have you tried removing it?

What mods are you using anyway?

My Game Data folder looks like this http://i.imgur.com/48AObBl.jpg

Some of the stuff (like Interstellar Fuel Switch) I didn't ever put in myself, I'm assuming it piggy-backed its way in with some other mod. I have more stuff in there than I realised though haha.

hah, i managed to fix my problem...

i forgot to update rasterpropmonitor, now it works again.
Hmm, I updated RPM the other day because it wasn't working.

I'm having the same problem, I havent got any of the mods you have, so I wouldn't have a clue what's going on.

Right, ive pulled all the files out of the gamedata folder (excluding squad) and it's working again, might just be how mods interact with that file?
I might add that I moved my whole 1.0.5 out of the way and got onto the 1.1 experimental (so I could play 64-bit) and I finally have IVA for all cockpits.
